name: Timing of Ignatius
description:
Play the game in fullscreen, otherwise the  edges on the left and right side are cut off.
In order to advance to the next stage, you have to go through the black archway on the right side of the screen.

Timing of Ignatius is a singleplayer game made for the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam.

You only have one minute to live, fortunately you can make other creatures drop time by shooting them in their face with your cool projectile superpower.

To gain more strength, speed and other improvements you can use our Awesome Shop to buy upgrades with your lifetime.

During the gameplay you run through different stages and levels where you encounter different enemies and boss monsters which are trying to stop you from reaching your goal.

This is our first game jam game ever. If you have any problems or constructive feedback we would kindly appreciate it!

- Winning Conditions -
* Get to stage 48 *
* Have at least 5 minutes of lifetime *

- Controls -
* WASD to move *
* Mouse to aim *
* Left mouse button to shoot, you can hold your left mouse button down to shoot very fast
